short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small Conor slides into your window upon visting or refreshing any URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, anytime you visit a new window in your browser, a small Conor figure slides in to visit and entertain you with his short dances.  These dances include but are not limited to the chicken dance, hip shake and the disco combine.  The extension randomly choses one of multiple dance options to visit your screen.  The dances take place in the bottom left hand corner and only last 5 seconds before they disappear.
